title: Khita van mi thianghlim nen khian
lyrics:
Khitah van mithianghlim nen khian,
Hla i sa ho ang u;
Khawvela hnam tinrengte hian,
Thisen hlimna kan hmu.

Beramno i fak ang u,
Kalvari tlanga thi kha;
Halleluia! Halleluia!
Halleluia, Amen.

Beramno ropuizia a lang,
An hla sakkin an ti;
Beramno chawimawi tlak a ni,
Mihring aiin a thi.

Isua Krista neih tlak a ni,
Pathian thiltihtheihna;
Malsawmna zawng zawngte pawh hi,,
Kumkhuain Lalpa ta.

Khawvela awm zawng zawngte hian,
Hminng hlu chu an fak a;
Lalthuthlengah ropui takin,
Amah kan hmu ang a.
